```py
scipy.integrate.simpson(y, *, x=None, dx=1.0, axis=-1, even=<object object>)
```

```py
>>> from scipy import integrate
>>> import numpy as np
>>> x = np.arange(0, 10)
>>> y = np.arange(0, 10) 
```

```py
>>> y = np.power(x, 3)
>>> integrate.simpson(y, x)
1640.5
>>> integrate.quad(lambda x: x**3, 0, 9)[0]
1640.25 
```
